code: import transliterate from'../../../common/utils/transliterate';var processInputData=function processInputData(state){var imgAlt=transliterate(state.productName);var imgTitle=imgAlt;var newCategory=state.categoryName==='Электротовары и свет'?state.categoriesArray.categories[0].category:state.categoryName;var categoryId=state.categoriesArray.categories.filter(function(category){return category.category===newCategory;}).map(function(category){return category.id;}).join('');categoryId=Number(categoryId);var price='';if(state.productPrice.slice(-1)==='.'){price=state.productPrice.slice(0,-5);}var inStock=state.productInStock==='да'?Boolean(true):Boolean(false);var payload={data:{categoryId:categoryId,category:newCategory,description:state.productName,imgAlt:imgAlt,imgTitle:imgTitle,image:state.image,price:price,counter:1,inStock:inStock}};return payload;};export default processInputData;
